profile:
Reborn Renovations is a multiple award-winning custom home renovation company that provides a full range of interior & exterior home renovation services.
 
Reborn provides the highest level of general contracting and top-quality workmanship for all your Calgary, Okotos, Airdrie, Cochrane, and surrounding area home renovation needs. Sales coordinators, interior designers, and project managers are supplied for every job to ensure timelines are met and your renovation runs as smooth as possible while delivering the look you desire and staying on budget.
 
Our home renovation services include:

- Whole Home Renovations
- Multiroom Renovations
- Custom Home Builds
- Kitchen Renovations
- Basement Developments and Renovations 
- Bathroom Renovations
- Exterior Renovations
- Home Additions
- Home Extensions
- 2nd Floor Additions
- Garage Additions
- New Home Builds
- Infill Builds
- Acreage and Estate Builds

profile:
I have completed over 17 years of work in all types of home renovations from small tasks (i.e. fixing sinks, or electrical plug malfunction) to full demo and completion of:  kitchen, bathroom, roofing, flooring, decks, garage (minus the cement pad) including electrical. finishing work inclusive of doors, windows including full trim.
I have totally demoed 2 houses and rebuilt from the studs up to and including all electrical, plumbing, and finishing to turn key ready.
In the last three years upon joining Homestars we have honed our craft and are specializing in bathrooms. We have won Best of award 2 years in a row now and have qualified for a third year which will put us in the Best of the Best of Award!!

name: Elvis Renos

profile: Beatnik & Mod Inc. is a creative, modern flooring and renovation shop, located just minutes from Deerfoot Trail in SE Calgary. Our passion for helping others shows forth as we demonstrate quality craftmanship and second to none customer service.  Our showroom is inviting and not overwhelming and we offer FREE no-obligation estimates.

profile:
Smith Property Renovations is a local general contractor specializing in interior renovations.

If you are looking to complete a new renovation in your home, whether it be your kitchen, bathroom or anything in between we have you covered.

We offer unparalleled expert level finishing at a competitive rate.

Specializing in bathroom renovations

Some of the other services that can be provided:
Drywall (new and repairs)
Paint
Trim (baseboards, door/window casing)
Tile/stone work
Floating floor install
Free Estimates

Licensed and insured
References available

My preferred first contact is via email with a brief description of your job and roughly where in the city the project is located.

Thank you,
             Craig Smith
